phrs.translation: 卡里布, 北美驯鹿, 驯鹿, 北美产驯鹿
驯鹿咖啡, 嘉里伯咖啡, 驯鹿咖啡店
加拿大驯鹿十字, 驯鹿十字
林驯鹿, 丛林驯鹿, 森林驯鹿

sentences.sentence: Brown bears eat everything from caribou to berries.
sentences.translation: 棕熊则食用大到驯鹿小至浆果的所有食物。

sentences.sentence: Populations of lemmings, caribou and red knot (a shorebird) have all decreased.
sentences.translation: 旅鼠，驯鹿和红腹滨鹬(一种滨鸟)的种群数量都有所下降。

sentences.sentence: Every caribou knew when it was time to run and in which direction to go, even if it didn't know exactly why.
sentences.translation: 每只驯鹿都知道什么时候该跑以及往哪个方向跑，甚至它们并不知道它们为什么要那样。
